```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(ggPMX)
```

# Overview


# Init controller

```{r init_controller}

theophylline <- file.path(system.file(package = "ggPMX"), "testdata", 
                            "theophylline")
  WORK_DIR <- file.path(theophylline, "Monolix")
  input_file <- file.path(theophylline, "data_pk.csv")
  
  ctr <- pmx_mlx(
    config = "standing", 
    directory = WORK_DIR, 
    input = input_file, 
    dv = "Y", 
    dvid ="DVID",
    cats=c("SEX"),
    conts=c("WT0","AGE0"),
    strats="STUD")

```



# Plots

## Observations verus Predictions

```{r dv_pred}

ctr %>% pmx_plot_dv_pred
```
